contest-event.event-date:
Dec. 2, 1905 D Edinburgh Contest (First Section)
Edinburgh Contest (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest Edinburgh Contest edinburgh-contest-first-section
The Lily of Killarney [arr. Godfrey]
Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK International contest between England and Scotland. 4 bands from the Scottish Amateur BBA competed against 4 bands from the Durham and Northumberland BBA.
Feb. 20, 2012, 7:02 p.m. April 1, 2014, 2:33 p.m.
1 Polton Mills Friend Farrand
2 Broxburn Public Band Alexander Owen
3 Spencer's Steelworks Prize Band Robert Rimmer
4 Cockerton Prize Silver Band William Watson
Unknown Result Alloa Burgh Unknown
Unknown Result Backworth Colliery Band Unknown
Unknown Result Kelty & Blairadam Band Unknown
Unknown Result South Moor Colliery Silver Prize Band Unknown
